name: Xplat Storage Explorer
body:
# Azure Cross-Platform Storage Explorer

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/azure-storage/xplat/gh-pages/imgs/screenshot.png)

A cross-platform implementation of azure storage explorer allowing the manipulation of azure [blob storage](http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/storage-introduction/) accounts and eventually tables and queues.

If you've ever used [Azure Blob storage](http://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/services/storage/), you'll notice that there really isn't a blob explorer which will let you browse your assets easily. This project aims to make it easier for you to browse Azure blob storage without having to write a program on your Mac, Linux, or Windows box.

# Features

- Create Containers
- Search Containers
- Upload to Containers
- Bulk download of blobs
- Preview media blobs such as images, audio and video 

# Releases

## OSX

- [Beta (64-bit)](releases/beta/osx/azure-storage-explorer.tar.gz)

## Linux

- [Beta (64-bit)](releases/beta/osx/azure-storage-explorer-linux64.tar.gz)

## Windows

- [Beta (32-bit)](releases/beta/osx/azure-storage-explorer-win32.tar.gz)
